roleset.name: choose, pick

roles.note: Refer to 'pick' for usage of higher #'d args, if they appear.

example.name: just thing picked
example.text: Spreads will become so tight that it won't matter [which market]-1 an investor chooses *trace*-1 -- arbitrage will prevent him from gaining any temporary profit.

example.name: with attribute
example.text: Health and Human Services Secretary Louis Sullivan has chosen Antonia Novello to be the next surgeon general, Bush administration officials said.
example.arg: to be the next surgeon general
example.note: *note that the thing chosen here is a person (arg1), and she is chosen for a purpose (arg4).

example.name: where the thing chosen is an S-node
example.text: ... in *PRO*-1choosing *PRO*-2 to be a bride of Christ , they inevitably cocked a snook at lesser male fry .
example.arg: *PRO*-2 to be a bride of Christ
example.note: *the thing chosen here is actually the act of being a bride of Christ-- which makes it arg1.

roleset.note: Based on sentences in financial subcorpus. Comparison to pick. Member of VNcls get-13.5.1. Updated by Julia, 11/2010.
